entry.title: The REST API Custom API Generator For Cross Platform And Import Export In WP plugin for
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-5288

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/import-export-with-custom-rest-api/tags/2.0.3/backend/methods/wot-rapi-import-functions.php#L123

  • https://wordpress.org/plugins/import-export-with-custom-rest-api/#developers

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/0e2774fc-f028-436c-a8af-3c17378b9743?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

描述：

The REST API | Custom API Generator For Cross Platform And Import Export In WP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation due to a missing capability check on the process_handler() function in versions 1.0.0 to 2.0.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to POST an arbitrary import_api URL, import specially crafted JSON, and thereby create a new user with full Administrator privileges.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hqr5-32x6-7hw9

entry.title: Apache Kafka 客户端任意文件读取
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Kafka 客户端任意文件读取

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-27817

漏洞类型： 文件读取

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 允许未经身份验证的攻击者利用该漏洞实现任意文件读取，大多数据处理中间件或流式处理框架，如：Apache Spark Structured Streaming、Apache Druid等在应用中需要调用Kafka Connect组件，而这些服务会存储大量的核心业务系统敏感数据，一旦被攻击将造成更加严重的数据泄密。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Apache Kafka

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install功能存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，由于对Smart Install数据包的不当验证，未经身份验证的远程攻击者可通过发送特制的Smart Install消息（TCP端口4786）触发设备重新加载、执行任意代码或导致无限循环。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12325

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software contain a buffer overflow caused by improper validation of Smart Install packet data, letting unauthenticated remote attackers trigger device reload, execute arbitrary code, or cause indefinite loops, exploit requires sending crafted Smart Install message on TCP port 4786.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6d4b443f23fc
  • https://github.com/AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit
  • https///github.com:AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow

entry.title: Nagios Log Server 存储型跨站脚本漏洞（权限提升至管理员）
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Nagios Log Server 存储型跨站脚本漏洞（权限提升至管理员）

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-29471

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Nagios Log Server 2024R1.3.1中存在一个存储型跨站脚本（XSS）漏洞，允许低权限用户在其个人资料的’email’字段中注入恶意JavaScript代码。当管理员查看审计日志时，该脚本会执行，导致通过未经授权的管理员账户创建实现权限提升。在某些配置下，该漏洞可被串联利用以实现远程代码执行（RCE）。

产品厂商： Nagios

产品名称： Nagios Log Server

影响版本： 2024R1.3.1及以下版本

来源： https://github.com/skraft9/CVE-2025-29471

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

Stored XSS Vulnerability in Nagios Log Server (Privilege Escalation to Admin)

Date: 2025-04-02

Exploit Author: Seth Kraft

Vendor Homepage: https://www.nagios.com/

Vendor Changelog: https://www.nagios.com/changelog/#log-server

Software Link: https://www.nagios.com/products/log-server/download/

Version: 2024R1.3.1 and below

Tested On: Nagios Log Server 2024R1.3.1 (default configuration, Ubuntu 20.04)

CWE: CWE-79, CWE-352, CWE-285, CWE-269, CWE-602

CVSS: 9.3 (CVSS:4.0/AV:N/AC:L/AT:N/PR:L/UI:R/S:C/VC:H/VI:H/VA:H)

Type: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Privilege Escalation

Exploit Risk: Critical

Disclosure

For research and authorized testing only. Do not use against systems without permission.

Description:

A stored XSS vulnerability in Nagios Log Server 2024R1.3.1 allows a low-privileged user to inject
malicious JavaScript into the ‘email’ field of their profile. When an administrator views the audit logs,
the script executes, resulting in privilege escalation via unauthorized admin account creation.
The vulnerability can be chained to achieve remote code execution (RCE) in certain configurations.

PoC

  1. Log in as a standard (non-admin) user.

  2. Navigate to the profile update endpoint:

    http://<target-ip>/nagioslogserver/profile/update

  3. Inject the following payload into the email field:

  1. Host the xss.js payload on your external server with the following content:
  1. Wait for an administrator to view the audit logs. The JavaScript will execute, creating a new admin account:

Username: backdoor
Password: Password123!
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Nagios Log Server 存储型跨站脚本漏洞（权限提升至管理员）</

Template IDs or paths

Environment

Anything else?

entry.title: Windows Disk Cleanup Tool Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows Disk Cleanup Tool Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-21420

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Windows Disk Cleanup Tool中存在一个权限提升漏洞，攻击者可以利用该漏洞通过特定的技术手段提升至SYSTEM权限。该漏洞涉及cleanmgr.exe文件的SilentCleanup任务，该任务以最高权限运行，且存在任意文件夹删除/移动/重命名漏洞，可以被重定向至C:/Config.msi文件夹，进而实现权限提升。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows Disk Cleanup Tool

来源： https://github.com/moiz-2x/CVE-2025-21420_POC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-21420_POC.py
  • README.md
  • images

来源概述

Diffing cleanmgr.exe

The new version of cleanmgr.exe includes a call to the SetProcessMitigationPolicy function.


With MitigationPolicy set to 16, corresponding to ProcessRedirectionTrustPolicy.

Combined with Microsoft’s description of CWE-59: Improper Link Resolution Before File Access (‘Link Following’), we can infer that cleanmgr.exe has Redirection Guard enabled.

After reading two blog posts by Simon Zuckerbraun and enigma0x3:

  1. From Arbitrary Folder Delete/Move/Rename to SYSTEM EoP
  2. Bypass UAC

The SilentCleanup task may have sufficient privileges to delete the C:/Config.msi folder, as mentioned by Simon Zuckerbraun. We only need to locate an Arbitrary Folder Delete/Move/Rename vulnerability inside the SilentCleanup task (which runs cleanmgr.exe with Run with highest priv) and redirect it to the C:/Config.msi folder.

Observations via Procmon

Run the SilentCleanup task and observe cleanmgr.exe behavior.

The process checks whether the listed folders exist (interestingly, it doesn’t verify if C:\ESD is a junction, but it does check Windows and Download — which we won’t dive into here).

Create the folders C:\$Windows.~WS, C:\ESD\Windows, C:\ESD\Download, drop some random files into them, rerun SilentCleanup and observe again.

We can see SilentCleanup deletes the contents within the Windows and Download folders. This can be leveraged using the technique described in From Folder Contents Delete to SYSTEM EoP.

Exploit

  1. Python script creates 3 folders: C:\$Windows.~WS, C:\ESD\Windows, C:\ESD\Download, inserts dummy .txt files and pauses.
  2. Run FolderOrFileDeleteToSystem to set up the Config.msi.
  3. Run FolderContentsDeleteToFolderDelete to redirect content cleanup from C:\ESD\Windows to C:/Config.msi.
    Note: Exclude these two processes in Defender as AV may detect this exploit technique.
  4. Resume the Python script and run SilentCleanup to trigger content cleanup.
  5. Run osk.exe, then hit Ctrl-Alt-Delete.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows Disk Cleanup Tool Elevation of

entry.title: Oracle Coherence 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Oracle Coherence 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-2555

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Oracle Coherence是Oracle Fusion Middleware的一个组件，受影响版本包括3.7.1.0、12.1.3.0.0、12.2.1.3.0和12.2.1.4.0。该漏洞由于未经身份验证的网络访问通过T3协议，允许攻击者远程执行代码，危害Oracle Coherence的安全。攻击者需要通过网络访问T3协议来利用此漏洞。

产品厂商： Oracle

产品名称： Oracle Coherence

影响版本： 3.7.1.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0

搜索语法： http.title:”oracle access management”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12318

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Oracle Coherence of Oracle Fusion Middleware (versions 3.7.1.0, 12.1.3.0.0, 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0) contains a remote code execution caused by unauthenticated network access via T3, letting attackers compromise Oracle Coherence, exploit requires network access via T3.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157054/Oracle-Coherence-Fusion-Middleware-Remote-Code-Execution.html
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157207/Oracle-WebLogic-Server-12.2.1.4.0-Remote-Code-Execution.html
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157795/WebLogic-Server-Deserialization-Remote-Code-Execution.html
  • https://github.com/Qynklee/POC_CVE-2020-2555
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/1003dc67ff34
  • https///github.com:Qynklee/POC_CVE-2020-2555.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6179b4e1d51c
  • https///github.com:Y4er/WebLogic-Shiro-shell.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/235a5c344d3f
  • https///gitee.com:chenjiew/CVE-2020-2555.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/322326255843
  • https///gitee.com:mstir/CVE-2020-2555.git
  • https://github.com/Maskhe/cve-2020-2555
  • https://github.com/Y4er/CVE-2020-2555
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/2c95cddac1b5
  • https///github.com:Y4er/CVE-2020-2555.git
  • https://github.com/wsfengfan/CVE-2020-2555
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/e667362e551e
  • https///github.com:wsfengfan/CVE-2020-2555.git
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2020-2555
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/c9e0223955e2
  • https///github.com:0xn0ne/weblogicScanner.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"oracle access management"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: SQL注入漏洞分析面板

  • CVE： CVE-2025

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞描述： 通过分析从https://cve.mitre.org/网站提取的数据，详细研究了2025年出现的SQL注入漏洞及其影响的系统。

来源概述

CVE-Guvenlik-Acigi-Analiz-Paneli

https://cve.mitre.org/ web sitesinden çektiğim verileri analiz ederek SQL injection ile ilgili 2025 yılında çıkmış açıkları ve açıkların etkili olduğu sistemleri detayları bir şekilde inceledim.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： SQL注入漏洞分析面板

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Vulnerability

漏洞类型： 服务器端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Metasploit Framework中的DNS欺骗模块（bailiwicked_domain和bailiwicked_host）存在异常抛出问题，可能导致DNS欺骗攻击失败。此问题与DNS库的更改未正确移植到这些模块中有关。

产品厂商： Rapid7

产品名称： Metasploit Framework

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20172

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Both bailiwicked modules are throwing exceptions on 7b5b57a392927e8ddac9824ff1713d051de2a3ff. I’m guessing that the issue is related to DNS library changes that weren’t ported into these modules.

Steps to reproduce

I was able to trigger these exceptions without a proper-vulnerable target, just by setting the options sufficiently to run the module.

These two modules should also probably be updated to default their SRCPORT to 0 since that’s a supported value to select an port automatically.

Spotted while testing #20145.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Vulne
